channel.title: HELP! problems
channel.description:
iv got a guy who sells items but u need points to get the items
the thing is, iv tried everywhere to look at how i change the points per item, and cant find it, im using empirescape v3, and how do i get co-ords?
also everytime i level a skill the character gets 10 reward points, how do i stop that?

item.title: HELP! problems
item.dc:creator: @RsInFecTion RsInFecTion
item.description:
@RsInFecTion wrote:

Well most servers have a command to figure out their position. Just in game, go to your position and type ::mypos

Read full topic
